text: Over on Twitter, a question -- "What do you do to feel more confident?" I have an answer, but it's sort of NSFW. So I'll post it here instead of there. Certain drugs in your bloodstream give you confidence. Not sure if this is true for women, but it is true for me, and I'd guess for other men. So when I'm feeling frail, or sad, or lacking direction, I stimulate my body to produce this drug. It's never failed. :boom:
